pullrequest.title: Deprecate functions to set linear/angular acceleration

content.html:
Ah sorry, I just saw a few calls to the functions which are probably triggering deprecation warnings, could you please remove them or add pragmas to ignore deprecation warnings (like this)? 

gazebo/physics/Model.cc:717:      (*iter)->SetLinearAccel(_accel);
gazebo/physics/Model.cc:731:      (*iter)->SetAngularAccel(_accel);

Also, feel free to completely erase the lines which are commented right now.
